body:
This smooth staff carved from hickory or yew allows use of the following spells:

  • Fireball (1 charge)
  • Magic missile (1 charge)
  • Shatter (1 charge)
  • Ice storm (2 charges)
  • Wall of force (2 charges)
  • Chain lightning (3 charges)
name: Staff of Evocation
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Evocation
